text: Barons Court is a London Underground station on the District and Piccadilly lines. It is in West Kensington, Greater London. The station is located on Gliddon Road, a short distance from Talgarth Road (A4) in the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham. Barons Court is between West Kensington and Hammersmith on the District Line, and between Earl's Court and Hammersmith on the Piccadilly Line. It is in Travelcard Zone 2. ==Related pages== *List of London Underground stations == References == ==Other websites== * London's Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** In the distance can be seen the Great Ferris wheel at Earl's Court exhibition ground. ** ** ** Category:District line stations Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Grade II listed buildings in London Category:Grade II listed railway stations
title: Barons Court tube station
